oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Geri Brown and Kelly Duck
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Memphis Public Library & Information Center; Main Library; libraries; books;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Geri Brown, Manager of the Children's Department, promotes the metric system. Note on back: "Memphis Public librarian Mrs. Geri Brown and Kelly Duck look over books on the metric system."
